TopicTitle: Access Violation: Crashes When I try to go anywhere past main menu

Articles.Content:
First, a googledrive link to the crash folder (one of many)

https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B00NH0Z7gdOHcDhCaEkyYjVORjQ&usp=sharing

I'm running KSP on my laptop as I visit family over the holiday. The Laptop has run KSP before (got me through some amazingly boring lectures at my university).

The problem seems to be access violation (at 0000000000). It's a new installation, no mods.

I start up the game, no problems, can navigate all the main menu options, and all subsequent options. The game crashes as soon as I try to start a new career/science/sandbox game.

It always dumps to the menu. I have tried running this in the 32 bit and 64 bit game modes. I have run both executables in admin mode, tried launching it with -force- opengpl ; nothing works at all.

Any help will be appreciated.

V/R,
